text:
@narendramodi @narendramodi govt has formed a help desk, in collaboration with #WhatsApp, to seek correct information about #COVID19

If you've access to WhatsApp u can use the number 9013151515 for the purpose: PMModi in interaction with citizens of #Kashi

#21DaysChallenge
#IndiaFightsCorona https://t.co/jHPCoLPrAM
